text: @RepMattGaetz What the fu** is wrong with you and your wild conspiracy theories? Scientists are clear that the novel coronavirus comes from bats. Yet, in your stupidity, you’ve promoted a theory that’s resulted in NIH pulling funding from research (60 Minutes, 5/10). #Wuhan #GaetzIsAnIdiot

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: 60 Minutes
entity.description: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. The correspondents and contributors include Lesley Stahl, Scott Pelley, Anderson Cooper, Bill Whitaker, Sharyn Alfonsi, Jon Wertheim and Norah O'Donnell .

entity.name: 60 Minutes
entity.description: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. The correspondents and contributors include Sharyn Alfonsi, Anderson Cooper, Steve Kroft, Lara Logan, Norah O'Donnell, Scott Pelley, Charlie Rose, Lesley Stahl, Jon Wertheim, Oprah Winfrey and Bill Whitaker.
